title: A US federal judge orders OpenAI to stop using the word "Cameo" for its Sora products and features, in a trademark lawsuit filed by celebrity video app Cameo (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
tags: TechCrunch;A US federal judge orders OpenAI to stop using the word“Cameo” for its Sora products and features, in a trademark lawsuit filed by celebrity video app Cameo
